product_title: Small Kan U Leather Shoulder Bag
product_color: selected Azzurro Merlino/ Vibrato Gold color
product_description: Iconic double-F hardware gleams against the hand-painted, embossed logos on this shoulder bag crafted from vibrantly hued calfskin leather.
product_details_and_care:
Iconic double-F hardware gleams against the hand-painted, embossed logos on this shoulder bag crafted from vibrantly hued calfskin leather. A divided interior keeps your essentials organized, while a chain strap adds signature sophistication.
Push-lock closure
Pull-through chain-and-leather strap
Interior wall pocket
Suede lined
Leather
Made in Italy
